entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

Temperature: 0.9°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of drizzle or rain. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain changing to 60 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h through mainland inlets and valleys this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of drizzle. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
